snippet: Growth in the region that includes China, Thailand and the Philippines will be 7.1 percent this year and 7.2 percent next year, according to the bank’s new projections.
abstract: World Bank lowers its growth forecast for large parts of eastern Asia; growth in the region that includes China, Thailand and the Philippines will be 7.1 percent in 2013 and 7.2 percent in 2014, according to the bank’s new projections, from 7.8 percent and 7.6 percent.
lead_paragraph: Growth in the region that includes China, Thailand and the Philippines will be 7.1 percent this year and 7.2 percent next year, according to the bank’s new projections.

headline.main: World Bank Lowers East Asia Growth Forecasts
headline.print_headline: World Bank Lowers East Asia Growth Forecasts

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
